name: hsmjs-typescript-consumer-test
description: TypeScript consumer test for @datnguyen1215/hsmjs dual package

scripts.test: echo 'TypeScript consumer test - checking types and imports' && node types-test.js
scripts.test:compile: echo 'Checking TypeScript type definitions exist' && ls -la ../../../dist/types/
scripts.test:types: echo 'Type checking skipped - runtime validation only'
